Simple Commands. admin - Brings up the admin menu. gmchat - Sends a global message that only GMs can see. Usage - //gmchat Type message here invul - Makes you invulnerable. invis - Makes you invulnerable. undying - Makes you can't die. silence - Used to block chat. tradeoff - Used to block trade. gmspeed - Used to increase speed. Usage - //gmspeed 0..4 gmshop - Opens the GMShop. itemcreate - Opens the item creation menu. create_item - Creates an item. Usage - //create_item item_id find_mammon - Find or teleport to mammon. Usage - //find_mammon 1..3 start_fc - Start Fight Club event. Usage - //start_fc 1-LastHero, 2-TvT, 3-Creatures, 4-CtF, 5-Treasure, 6-Korean, 7-Dominion oly_start / oly_stop - Start / Stop Olympiad. open / close - Open / Close the targeted Door. collapse - Collapse current instance zone. who - Get current real online. announce - One time announce. crit_announce - One time great announce. toscreen - One time announce to the center of game window. statistic - Show real-time and this day online statistic. Advanced Commands, Page 2
